title: when is riot going to stop choosing verbal as a report and actually make gameplay a bannable thing??
body:
legit, i have been banned/susspended multiple time over trying to explain to someone that doing nothing does not get you a win and so on. yes i say "bad words" get over it. the playerbase is over 16 and use the words everyday. what a time we live in to make this bullshit a gambling game (chance of players trolling or not) over a skill game like it once was. no wonder why faker isnt a respectable player anymore and has to play utility over a skill based champ. 

such a bullshit way to go money chasing is not a good direction when you have no competitors

replies.body: THIS. I feel like im persecuted every fkn game cause im an aussie. This is how we fucking talk!
